(aa) thalawakale polis wasame, gred westan galkanda waththe wisu manoj namathi pudgalaya thalawakale polisiya wisin anawashya lesa luhubandima nisa biyata pathwi jalashayata pana miya giya awasthawedi polisiya nisiyakarayen kriyathmaka nowu bawa pawasu wita, ahinsaka wathu kamkaru janathawagen paliganime chethanawen polisiya kriyathmaka wana awasthawe amathyanshaye pradhaniya washayen jon amarathunga mathithuma , swadhina parikshanayak pawathwima sandaha awashya katayuthu sampadanaya nokara, eya paseka thaba me siddhiya sambandhayen udghoshana kala ahinsaka wathu kamkaru janathawa me wana wita athadanguwata ganimin sitina bawin, owun thawaduratath pidawata lakwa athi heyin da,

meya gaurawaniya thanantharayak wana athara, fild marshalwarayeku meheyum ho paripalana wagakim nodaranu atha.kese wethath fonseka mahatha sakriya deshapalanaye niyuthu heyin gatalu pana nagimata ida atha samanyayen mewani usas thnathrakata path wu pasu ee aayathana wyuhayen athwa sitima samanyaya sampradayayi.eheth fonseka mahatha hata karunu yedunu hatiyen ohuta digatama deshapalanaye niratha wimata sidu wiya.matha siduwu pathwim walata ohu pudgalayin nirdesha kala athara ee sambandhayen aarakshaka ansha wala atham piris wirodhaya pala kalaha.anek athata fonseka mahathata dirga kalayak thisse kerunu akatayuthu kam niwaradi kirimapilibandawa dadi prasadayak dakwana pirisda sitithi.
